SELECT (SELECT FILE_LOAD FROM EV_CAR_IMAGE I1 WHERE I1.CAR_NO = E1.CAR_NO AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS fileLoad , E1.RENT_CAR_PRICE AS rentCarPrice , G.REGION_SIDO AS regionSido , CT.CAR_TYPE_NO AS carTypeNo , CT.CAR_TYPE_NAME AS carTypeName , CC.COMPANY_NO AS companyNo , CC.COMPANY_NAME AS companyName , CI.CAR_NAME AS carName , CI.CAR_YEAR AS carYear , E1.RENT_CAR_NO rentCarNo , CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM EV_ING_HOTDEAL ih JOIN EV_HOT_DEAL h ON ih.HOT_DEAL_NO = h.HOT_DEAL_NO WHERE ih.RENT_CAR_NO = E1.RENT_CAR_NO AND h.STATUS = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN h.START_DATE AND h.END_DATE ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ingHotdeal , (SELECT H.DEAL_PERCENT FROM EV_ING_HOTDEAL IH JOIN EV_HOT_DEAL H ON IH.HOT_DEAL_NO = H.HOT_DEAL_NO WHERE IH.RENT_CAR_NO = E1.RENT_CAR_NO AND H.STATUS = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN H.START_DATE AND H.END_DATE AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS dealPercent FROM EV_RENT_CAR_INFO E1 LEFT JOIN EV_CATEGORY E2 ON E1.CATEGORY_NO = E2.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN EV_GARAGE G ON G.GARAGE_NO = E1.GARAGE_NO LEFT JOIN EV_CAR_INFO CI ON CI.CAR_NO = E1.CAR_NO LEFT JOIN EV_CAR_COMPANY CC ON CI.COMPANY_NO = CC.COMPANY_NO LEFT JOIN EV_CAR_TYPE CT ON CI.CAR_TYPE_NO = CT.CAR_TYPE_NO
WHERE 1=1 AND E1.CATEGORY_NO = #{category} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM EV_RESERVATION_LIST RL WHERE RL.RENT_CAR_NO = E1.RENT_CAR_NO AND SYSDATE BETWEEN RL.RENTAL_TIME AND RL.RETURN_TIME AND PAYMENTS_STATUS = 'COMPLETED' )

SELECT (SELECT FILE_LOAD FROM EV_CAR_IMAGE I1 WHERE I1.CAR_NO = E1.CAR_NO AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS fileLoad , E1.RENT_CAR_PRICE AS rentCarPrice , G.REGION_SIDO AS regionSido , CT.CAR_TYPE_NO AS carTypeNo , CT.CAR_TYPE_NAME AS carTypeName , CC.COMPANY_NO AS companyNo , CC.COMPANY_NAME AS companyName , CI.CAR_NAME AS carName , CI.CAR_YEAR AS carYear , E1.RENT_CAR_NO rentCarNo , CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM EV_ING_HOTDEAL ih JOIN EV_HOT_DEAL h ON ih.HOT_DEAL_NO = h.HOT_DEAL_NO WHERE ih.RENT_CAR_NO = E1.RENT_CAR_NO AND h.STATUS = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN h.START_DATE AND h.END_DATE ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ingHotdeal , (SELECT H.DEAL_PERCENT FROM EV_ING_HOTDEAL IH JOIN EV_HOT_DEAL H ON IH.HOT_DEAL_NO = H.HOT_DEAL_NO WHERE IH.RENT_CAR_NO = E1.RENT_CAR_NO AND H.STATUS = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN H.START_DATE AND H.END_DATE AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS dealPercent FROM EV_RENT_CAR_INFO E1 LEFT JOIN EV_CATEGORY E2 ON E1.CATEGORY_NO = E2.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN EV_GARAGE G ON G.GARAGE_NO = E1.GARAGE_NO LEFT JOIN EV_CAR_INFO CI ON CI.CAR_NO = E1.CAR_NO LEFT JOIN EV_CAR_COMPANY CC ON CI.COMPANY_NO = CC.COMPANY_NO LEFT JOIN EV_CAR_TYPE CT ON CI.CAR_TYPE_NO = CT.CAR_TYPE_NO WHERE E1.RENT_CAR_NO = #{rentCarNo}
